department: Public Services and Procurement Canada, PSPC
short_summary: TSPS 1.2 Organizational Design and Classification Consultant
description: This requirement is for the support services of two Senior Organizational Design and Classification Consultants.
full_summary:
# TSPS 1.2 Organizational Design and Classification Consultant (PSIB)
Term: Human Resources Consulting Services
## Project Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada’s (PSPC) Human Resources Branch invites qualified contractors to tender for Human Resources consulting services for Organizational Design and Classification Consultant services in accordance with the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) methodology.

The requirement is open only to Tier 1 Supply Arrangement (SA) holders with the necessary competencies and expertise in Organizational Design and Classification Consultant services.

## Key Highlights

- **Category:** Human resources consulting services (80101511)
- **Tenure:** Short-term (60-day/year) and optional 2-year extensions
- **Security Level:** Common Professional Services Security Requirement Check List #6 (Protected A and B)
- **Trade Agreements:** None

## Tender Requirements

The contractors will provide the following services:

* Review organizationalmandates
* Review and update position job descriptions and classification rationales
* Develop and propose updates to the organizations
* Provide guidance and develop organizational model options and associated parameters

## Submission Instructions

Submissions are open only to the selected suppliers from the following list:

* Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
* Aurav Resources Inc.
* Bixia Defence Solutions
* Cactus Improvement and external goods
* Gyantium Creation Inc.
* Hexis Marshall Wo External interface Inc.
* Merillow the ibler at Modular contribution Claims.
